text: THE LAST THING I NEED ARE SOME HALF-ASSED ANSWERS!!!
Q: I rubbed my tummy to make a genie like Daifuku come out, and all that emerged was an extra-big fart.
Q: I'm curious about Galette's power, and how she immobilized Nami. There sure are a lot of people in the Charlotte Family who have powers.

A: Galette is a Butterwoman with the power of the Butter-Butter Fruit. She can control butter. So the answer is butter. You're right that there's a whole lot of Devil Fruit powers here, but it would bog everything down to stop and explain them all, so my idea is, if it's not central to the story, just breeze through and take it all in stride! The SBS segment and bonus materials are for the people who really want to know everything!
Q: It seems like the officers who work for the Four Emperors also have very high bounties. Do they get boosts in their bounty value just for being the subordinate of a particular pirate?

A: Oh yes, they absolutely do. I mean, after what happened in Dressrosa, the Straw Hats and other gladiators got 50 million Belly increases as a general rule, and the captains often get a bigger increase than the individual members. So you see, it's actually quite difficult to measure a person's strength by the amount placed on their head.
Q: Hello, Oda Sensei! Please tell us the hobbies and most and least favorite foods of the four Revolutionary Army captains!

Karasu
Hobby: Volunteering
Likes: Sausages
Hates: Chicken dishes

Hobby: Board games
Likes: Hamburg steak
Hates: Cookies

Belo Betty
Hobby: Vegetable garden
Likes: Almonds
Hates: Mayonnaise

Morley
Hobby: Karaoke, underground walks
Likes: Bagna cauda
Hates: Fish
